channel.title: Ryzen-Ai on Tategoto Azarasi
channel.description: Recent content in Ryzen-Ai on Tategoto Azarasi

item.title: Troubleshooting a Stubborn DMIC on a ThinkBook 16 G7+ ASP with Linux
item.description: Detailed troubleshooting process for fixing a silent digital microphone on a Lenovo ThinkBook 16 G7+ ASP (AMD Ryzen AI 9) laptop running Linux, primarily resolved by adding the kernel module parameter options snd_sof_amd_common enable_pdm=1.

item.title: Matrix Multiplication Performance Benchmark: from Triple Loops to 100+ GFLOPS on AMD Ryzen AI + Radeon
item.description: An in-depth benchmark comparing the performance of 11 matrix multiplication implementations (Naive, CPU multi-core/SIMD/BLAS, GPU via OpenCL/HIP/Vulkan) on AMD Ryzen AI + Radeon, revealing vast performance gaps and optimization insights.
